pullrequest.title: Install setup.sh in /usr only if PREFIX is /opt/ros in order to respect catkin ws

content.raw:
Two comments:

* Currently the setup.sh script is installed to: `share/drcsim_model_resources/drcsim_model_resources/setup.sh`. Perhaps we can remove one of those `drcsim_model_resources/` from the path?

* Can we also install the setup.sh to `${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/drcsim` for catkin workspaces?
